movie.title: Ben Platt Live from Radio City Music Hall
movie.title_english: Ben Platt Live from Radio City Music Hall
movie.title_long: Ben Platt Live from Radio City Music Hall (2020)
movie.description_intro: The September 29, 2019 concert at Radio City Music Hall is the last stop and fitting culmination to a spectacular sold-out tour that Ben Platt embarked on in support of his debut solo album in 2019. Backed by a full band and a ready wit, Ben Platt's intimate concert will feature tracks from his first album, "Sing to Me Instead" including his recent single "Rain", as well as a few cover versions of popular tunes.
movie.description_full: The September 29, 2019 concert at Radio City Music Hall is the last stop and fitting culmination to a spectacular sold-out tour that Ben Platt embarked on in support of his debut solo album in 2019. Backed by a full band and a ready wit, Ben Platt's intimate concert will feature tracks from his first album, "Sing to Me Instead" including his recent single "Rain", as well as a few cover versions of popular tunes.

movies.title: Footloose
movies.summary: Being a teenager is tough, and no one knows this better than Ren McCormack, a city kid with a strong feeling for music. Ren's life changes when he moves to a small town where rock-n-roll and dancing are criminal activities. When Ren falls in love with the reverend's daughter, Ariel Moore, the music pauses and Ren needs to shape up or make dancing a legal activity once again.
movies.description_full: Being a teenager is tough, and no one knows this better than Ren McCormack, a city kid with a strong feeling for music. Ren's life changes when he moves to a small town where rock-n-roll and dancing are criminal activities. When Ren falls in love with the reverend's daughter, Ariel Moore, the music pauses and Ren needs to shape up or make dancing a legal activity once again.

movies.title: The Last Dragon
movies.summary: In New York City, a young man searches for the "master" to obtain the final level of martial arts mastery known as the glow. Along the way, he must fight a martial arts expert corrupted with power, and rescue a beautiful singer from an obsessed music promoter.
movies.description_full: In New York City, a young man searches for the "master" to obtain the final level of martial arts mastery known as the glow. Along the way, he must fight a martial arts expert corrupted with power, and rescue a beautiful singer from an obsessed music promoter.

movies.title: Cobain: Montage of Heck
movies.summary: An authorized documentary on the late musician Kurt Cobain, from his early days in Aberdeen, Washington to his success and downfall with the grunge band Nirvana.
movies.description_full: An authorized documentary on the late musician Kurt Cobain, from his early days in Aberdeen, Washington to his success and downfall with the grunge band Nirvana.
movies.synopsis: An authorized documentary on the late musician Kurt Cobain, from his early days in Aberdeen, Washington to his success and downfall with the grunge band Nirvana.

movies.title: It Might Get Loud
movies.summary: A documentary on the electric guitar from the point of view of three significant rock musicians: the Edge, Jimmy Page and Jack White.
movies.description_full: A documentary on the electric guitar from the point of view of three significant rock musicians: the Edge, Jimmy Page and Jack White.
movies.synopsis: A documentary on the electric guitar from the point of view of three significant rock musicians: the Edge, Jimmy Page and Jack White.
